Column.Name: Can Use Action
Column.Formula:
IF( [Can Use Action] = NULL(), ARRAY(ROLE("Everyone")),
ARRAY_FIRST([Can Use Action]) <> ROLE(ARRAY_FIRST([Can Use Action])), ARRAY(ROLE("Everyone")),
[Can Use Action] )

Column.Name: Module Data
Add New Visible in Report Tiles

CheckBox.Text: Enable function to add new records directly from report tiles on the dashboard
CheckBox.ReferencedDataColumn: Add New Visible in Report Tiles

Information.Text: Will enable / disable the ability to add a new record from the report tile on the dashboard.

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Label.Text: Add custom links to appear at the bottom of the dashboard. Supports links to other online sites and direct document downloads.
To upload a document to be available for download you must add a 'quicklink' to store the document then reference the quicklink url in the URL field in the custom link.

Binding.Expression: "Quicklinks can be managed here"

"
"

Label.Text: Add reports to appear on the dashboard

Binding.Expression: IFERROR( ARRAY_SORT(DB_GETEFORMS(), $(i) $i), ARRAY( "Action", "Communication", "Contract", "Contract Contact", "Contract Review", "Defects Entry", "Defects Liability", "Extension", "Insurance", "Issue", "Key Performance Indicator", "KPI Performance", "KPI Target", "Meeting", "Milestone", "Multiple Award Contract", "Novation", "Panel", "Penalty Clause", "Purchase Order", "Risk", "Security", "Service Level Agreement", "Insurance", "Transition", "Variation", "Warranty" ) )
OR( [Report Type] = "Link and Export", [Report Type] = "Chart", [Report Type] = "EForm" )
ARRAY( HASH("value", "Link and Export", "text", "Export report"), HASH("value", "Chart", "text", "Visual report"), HASH("value", "EForm", "text", "Detailed report") )

"
"

Label.Text: Manage the actions that appear at the top of the dashboard

Binding.Expression: OR( [Dashboard Action Type] = "URL", ISBLANK([Dashboard Action Type]) )
OR( [Dashboard Action Type] = "Existing Record", [Dashboard Action Type] = "New Record" )
OR( [Dashboard Action Type] = "Existing Record", [Dashboard Action Type] = "New Record" )
AND( [Dashboard Action Type] <> NULL, [Dashboard Action Type] <> "Do nothing" )

"
"

"
"

"
"

Information.Text:
If Contracts records already exist be sure to select a prefix that doesn't already exist as part of the actual Contract Number as it will be treated as a prefix if the combination matches.
This mostly applies when using Numbers as a prefix; a simple solution to avoid the issue is to include a symbol in the prefix e.g. "18/19", or "2019-"

CheckBox.Text: Add current financial year to prefix

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY( "RecordID", "Company Name", "BusinessNumber" ), "Vendor", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [RecordID] IN " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor RecordIDs]) )

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.FieldValuesFormula:
LET $standardData := HASH( "Status", "Active", "Cost Center", "Cost Center A", "Setup Complete", TRUE, "Setup Step", 3 );
RETURN HASH_MERGE( $standardData, ARRAY_INDEX([Generated Contract Data], $count) )

RaiseLinkedEForm.Description: Generate new ID using RecordID to ensure uniqueness

SetReturnValue.ResultValueFormula: [Risk Number Prefix] & IF( [Use Current Year Prefix], YEAR(NOW()) & "-", [Use Current Financial Year Prefix], FINANCIALYEAR(NOW()) & "-" ) & [Temp] + 1
